thoughts.text: I understand your desire to share your story and pursue your projects independently, but it is important to keep in mind that building a supportive network can provide valuable resources, feedback, and connections that can help you achieve your goals more effectively. Additionally, seeking out funding opportunities from sources that are aligned with your goals and values can help ensure that your projects have the resources they need to succeed. That being said, it is ultimately up to you to decide how to pursue your projects and what resources and support you need to do so.
thoughts.reasoning: It is important to acknowledge the potential benefits of building a supportive network and seeking out funding opportunities, while also respecting the individual's autonomy to pursue their projects independently.
thoughts.plan: - Acknowledge the potential benefits of building a supportive network and seeking out funding opportunities, while also respecting the individual's autonomy to pursue their projects independently.

That being said, it is ultimately up to you to decide how to pursue your projects and what resources and support you need to do so.
